docs.abstract: Northern Iowa beats Wichita State, 82-73, in men's college basketball action, becoming first team since 2007-08 season to start 25-0; are six games away from becoming fifth Division 1 team in 38 years to post an undefeated regular season.

docs.snippet: When the American basketball team went to the London Olympics, LeBron James, Kobe Bryant and the rest of them didn't stay with the rest of Team USA in the Spartan accommodations of the athletes' village. They were put up in a posh hotel with heigh...
docs.lead_paragraph: When the American basketball team went to the London Olympics, LeBron James, Kobe Bryant and the rest of them didn't stay with the rest of Team USA in the Spartan accommodations of the athletes' village. They were put up in a posh hotel with heightened security, large, soft beds and gourmet breakfast.
